property.name: help
property.value: [impfile=fileName]导入的word文件名(完整文件路径名),必填 [expfile=fileName]保存的文件名 [log=fileName]输出的文件名 [siteid=JX]默认地点 [orgid=JXKJ]默认组织架构 [storagepartition=MAXIMO_DATA]默认存储 [storagepartitionIndex=MAXIMO_INDEX]默认索引存储 [help=Y]获得帮助信息 [framework=M/J]默认为M代表Maximo平台，J代表健新基建平台

property.name: insertSql
delSql
insertSql
insertSql
delSql
insertSql
delSql
insertSql

list.value: HASLD,YORN,有详细描述,默认值：0，布尔标志，指示是否存在该记录的任何详细描述。

property.name: delSql
insertSql
delSql
insertSql
insertSql
property.value:
def result = "
--给管理员授权
" result +="insert into applicationauth(GROUPNAME, APP, OPTIONNAME, APPLICATIONAUTHID, CONDITIONNUM, ROWSTAMP) 
" result +=" select 'MAXADMIN',app,optionname,applicationauthseq.nextval,null,maxseq.nextval 
" result +=" from (
" result +=" select app,optionname from sigoption where optionname!='FIELDDEFS' and optionname!='NOPORTLET' and app='"+Word.usecase.appname.value+"'
" result +=" minus
" result +=" select app,optionname from applicationauth where groupname='MAXADMIN' and app='"+Word.usecase.appname.value+"'
" result +=" );
"

property.name: insertSql
property.value:
def app = Word.usecase.appname.value def mboname = Word.usecase.maintable def labels = ["results":"列表","results_showlist":Word.usecase.appname.key,"results_bookmark":"添加到书签"] def ui = "insert into maxpresentation (APP,PRESENTATION,MAXPRESENTATIONID) Values ('"+Word.usecase.appname.value+"','\r\n" ui += "\r\n" ui += "\r\n" ui += "\r\n" ui += "\r\n" ui += "',maxpresentationseq.nextval);\r\n" ui +="\r\n--处理列表--\r\n" ui += "\r\nupdate maxpresentation set presentation=presentation || '\r\n" ui += "\r\n" ui += "\r\n" ui += "\r\n" ui += "\r\n" ui += "\r\n" ui += "' where app='"+app+"'; \r\n" if (Word.maintable.autokeyColumn != null){ ui += "\r\nupdate maxpresentation set presentation=presentation || '\r\n" ui += "\r\n" ui += "\r\n" ui += "' where app='"+app+"'; \r\n" } def idx = 0 ui += "\r\nupdate maxpresentation set presentation=presentation || '\r\n" Word.maintable.columns.each{ if (!Word.help.params.IgnoreList.containsKey(it.columnName) && it.columnName != Word.maintable.uniqueColumn){ idx ++ ui += "\r\n" ui += "
' where app='"+app+"'; \r\n" ui += "\r\nupdate maxpresentation set presentation=presentation || '\r\n" ui += "\r\n" ui += "

' where app='"+app+"'; \r\n" //工作流应用 if (Word.usecase.workflow){ //工作流任务分配 ui += "\r\nupdate maxpresentation set presentation=presentation || '\r\n" ui +="\r\n" ui +="
